description: Sin descripción

name: Burning Dead
description:
Survive the terror in Burning Dead.

Escape through forests and mountains full of zombies.

Rescue your daughter and become a hero.

name: Heroes Clash
description: Sin descripción

name: PunBall
description: This story takes place in a once barren land, where Zeus created civilization. Over time, Zeus grew lazy and an evil Shade appeared and wreaking havoc, bringing waves of evil to all.

name: Mojito the Cat: Deluxe Edition
description: Remember! Gravity is not an issue if you have the right mindset. Multiple characters Become a fierce shark, an angry bull, a mighty rhino or a fluffy panda. With the Sushi DLC, you can also turn into a tasty Japanese-style rice snack. Key features: - min…

name: Camper Van Simulator 2
description: Experience a summer getaway of your lifetime! Drive and park awesome cars, campers, bike and other vehicles!

name: Kids Box
description: 3-IN-1 coloring and jigsaw puzzle games to play alone or with friends!

name: Hell Let Loose: Anniversary Edition
description:
Over the past year, millions have heard the battle cry and risen to fight in this epic WWII first person shooter.

Join the masses, where you and your teammates will face off against 50 other skilled soldiers, playing unique important roles, on a series of iconic battlefields.

name: Little Nightmares II: The Nome's Attic
description: Follow the Nomes to find this special in-game puzzle and unlock the Nomes' hat as a reward upon completion.

name: Motorbike Racing Bundle
description: Enjoy the most complete racing experience ever with RIDE 3 and celebrate your passion for motorcycles with MotoGP19, immersing yourself in the official 2019 season!

name: PlayDaPon
description: The classic 16-bit action puzzle game brought to your playdate in vivid 1-bit color

name: Clifftop Games Bundle I Kathy Rain: Director's Cut + Whispers of a Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: TS Marketplace: LMS Period 1 Non-Corridor Coach Pack BR Crimson
description: The general styling of LMS Period I coaches followed much the same ideas which were used throughout Britain.

name: Eternal Return: Beachside Splash Character Bundle
description: The new Eternal Return DLC is here with the summer heat! Meet the Beachside Splash Character Bundle DLC at a special price.

name: The Sims 4: Pastel Pop Kit
description: Design a soft and playful bedroom that’s perfect for daydreaming with The Sims 4 Pastel Pop Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Everyday Clutter Kit
description: Craft spaces that look loved and lived-in with The Sims 4 Everyday Clutter Kit.

name: Senran Kagura: Estival Versus - Splash Pack
description: The high-flying, high-bouncing ninja girls of Senran Kagura return, this time with more moves, more playable characters, more story and attitude, and more destruction online with matches that can support up to 10 players.

name: Jurassic World Evolution: Deluxe Dinosaur Pack
description: This pack of additional dinosaurs is for owners of the base game who would like to upgrade to the Deluxe Edition of Jurassic World Evolution.

name: Generation Zero: Base Defense Pack
description: Your battles with countless machines have paid off - other Resistance members have become inspired by your successes and have designed new structures to help keep your base varied and ready for any kind of attack. This is only the beginning of how to expand on your base, and with the following structures you are ready for battle once more.

name: Generation Zero: Blockbuster Vanity Pack
description: Everyone knows that the summer season is a perfect time to sit back with an action-packed blockbuster and let the movie magic happen. And few decades had such excellent ones as the 1980s, so in tribute to some of those, you can now mix and match between 4 iconic new outfits as well as express your love for them using 6 emotes.

name: Generation Zero: Schweet Vanity Pack
description: The summer warmth has finally reached Sweden, and it’s time to celebrate Midsummer with some schweet new outfits from the 1980s. Mix between the various articles from four stylish new sets, each with a unique combination of accessories, clothing and hairstyles. Express your excitement with 5 stellar new emotes, and start dancing around the maypole.

name: Fury of the Furries 2
description: The long awaited sequel to Fury of the Furries is here. The 1993 Amiga & PC platform game is back on PC, with larger levels, more challenges, 25% more pixels, more bosses, an much much more bonuses.

name: GasZilla
description: A huge lizard, like Godzilla, has awakened after a thousand-year sleep and is going to destroy everything in its path. Help bring humanity back to the stone age as soon as possible.

name: Gatekeeper: Eclipse
description: Fast-paced rogue-lite shooter. Gatekeeper: Eclipse is a prologue ver. of the game Gatekeeper. Go on a quest to find the stolen Heart of the Universe and shoot your way through the hordes of machine enemies in solo or in co-op with friends!

name: Fap Goddess
description: Start your isekai journey in the land of goddesses, abyssal creatures and match-3 block madness - with a side of very, very naughty action! Create your dream harem while discovering the story behind each goddess, all while enjoying fun mechanics and engaging events!

name: Fight Angel Special Edition: Clothes Expansion Pack
description: This DLC is the Costume Expansion Pack for the Fight Angels SE version, with over 80 brand new costumes built in, each one color-modifiable, breakable in combat, and applicable to all characters.

name: Fight Angel Special Edition: Realistic Pack
description: This DLC provides the original version of realistic style character customization options. Players can choose realistic style character appearances, suitable for 10 built-in characters and custom characters. You can switch between the two styles at any time.

name: Find All 4: Magic
description: Find over 1,000 cute animals and objects in a lot of levels of varying difficulty. The magical black and white world comes alive after coloring. Relax and enjoy playing.

name: Erannorth Chronicles: Guilds and Secret Societies
description: Enrich your adventures with the third Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Guilds and Secret Societies" enhances all the Organizations with new Perks, Cards, and Contacts and adds various new interactions and NPCs across the world to make each of your adventures more memorable and unique.

name: Elevator Action: Returns - S-Tribute
description: Infiltrate a terrorist occupied tower, airport, and shopping mall to get classified data and stop their plans. New features have been added to this revival of the home console version of Elevator Action Returns, a masterpiece 2D action game. Also features 2 player mode.

name: Engine Evolution 2023
description: Your favorite racing MMO is back - this time with amazing tracks, more entertaining physics, and much more! Enjoy multiplayer racing action more intense than ever before!

name: Empires Apart: Aztec Civilization Pack
description: The warriors of Tenochtitlan rush into battle! Play as the fierce Aztecs – an aggressive civilization that focuses on strong warriors, spies and priests.

name: Big Buck Hunter Arcade: Elk Adventure Pack
description: Elk Adventure pack will include an all new bonus adventure hunting area featuring an additional 3 treks and 5 sites where you’ll have an opportunity to shoot a variety of Bulls, don’t shot the cows!

name: East Wind
description: East Wind is a survival adventure game takes place in a procedurally generated world. Alone or with friends, you will gather resources, craft items and embark on a journey to explore the world.

name: Echo of the Last Light
description: Solve puzzles and fight enemies with your smart and loyal companion.

name: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon - Trooper Special Issue Enforcer Package
description: The Trooper Special Issue Enforcer Package has 10 weapons designed for the EDF's ground forces.

name: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon - Tactician Advanced Tech Package
description: Make the most out the Earth Defense Force Tactical Armor with the Tactician Advanced Tech Package for Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon.

name: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon - Aerialist Munitions Package
description: Make the most out the Earth Defense Force Tactical Armor with the Tactician Advanced Tech Package for Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon.

name: Dungeons and Myths
description: "Dungeons and Myths" is a 2D tower defence game with a roguelike element. Place traps and monsters to defend your dungeon, pick upgrade after every wave of enemies!

name: Doughball Descent
description: Doughball Descent is a Roguelite Puzzle-Platformer about smashing through tiles with your sheer weight as you amass food & items as you traverse the procedurally generated layers of the Food Zigguraut

name: Dragon Inn
description: Dragon Inn is a visualization tool for roleplaying games online. You can create your own room, invite people with code and create your own character. You can track your stats, equipments, spells, features and status effects easily with Dragon Inn.

name: Drunkle Ted's Wet and Wreckless
description: Play as Drunkle Ted. He needs to get some quick cash together and get back on his feet. Luckily he found his missing foot and is literally back on his feet! Try to complete as many tasks as you can before time runs out. It's like drunk walking THPS

name: Crossout: Arsonist Pack
description: This pack includes: Unique armored car Wild Fire on augers. Weapons — two shotguns Junkbow; Unique cabin: Cerberus of epic rarity. Early access to structural parts of the Firestarters faction. Unique hero portrait: Red Hot. A unique paint can: Fire Salamander of relic rarity. Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55.

Additionally, the player gets: - A set of unique stickers. - Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55.

description: This pack includes: Unique armored vehicle on hovers "DeLirium TMS"; Weapons - Two plasma emitters "Synthesis"; Unique hovers Icarus IV; Unique hero portrait: "Lloyd"; Cabin: Quantum of epic rarity; Unique paint cans: Red Moon, White Sun; 4200 in-game coins; Increases the maximum number of parts used to 60.

name: CraMagear
description: An action game where you fight your enemies with free strategy! Use the skill tree to unlock your favorite skills and set up to 8 skills! Use the skills you've set up to take on missions!

name: Crash Time: Undercover
description: In Crash Time - Undercover you will experience non-stop racing action, and embark on a high-octane manhunt, with thrilling car chases and lots of explosive missions! Are you ready? Highways are waiting for you!

name: Crossout: Triad - The Keeper pack
description: Armoured vehicle Harmony; Unique weapon of epic rarity Yongwang; Unique portrait Munmu; Paint can Dark gold; 1500 in-game coins; Cabin Pilgrim of special rarity; Small track of epic rarity (2 pcs.); Hardened track of epic rarity, (2 pcs.) ;Increases the maximum number of parts used to 62.

description: This pack includes: Unique armored vehicle: Prancing pony; Weapons: Autocannon AC43 Rapier and MM5-4 Vector machine gun; Unique cabin: Jockey; Special Wheels: Stallion and Stallion (ST); A unique hero portrait: Bonnie; A unique paint can: Lollipop; A paint can: Aluminium; Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55; Unique sticker:

name: Crossout: Wasteland Warrior Pack
description: This pack includes: Unique armored vehicle Bloodhound; Vehicle weapon - 2 Sledgehammer shotguns; Unique character portrait: Aleph; Paint can: Dark red, Pattern: Scorched Earth; 1500 in-game coins; Number of vehicle parts rises to 55.

name: Crossout: Wholesale Recall Pack
description: This pack includes: Early access to the Adventure mode (available from level 3) Unique armoured vehicle Enigma Engine Oppressor of epic rarity. Weapons: Shotgun Sledgehammer — 3 pcs. Unique character portrait John Doe Unique decor: Winnetou and Chingachgook. A set of exclusive stickers — 4 pcs.

description: Enter the new era of Formula 1 in EA SPORTS F1 22 the official video game of the 2022 FIA Formula One World Championship

• N.W.A. Staff

• Apollo's Ranger Outfit & Weapon
• Peirates Outfit & Weapon
• Snowspire Guard Outfit & The Jackarse Weapon

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - In-Genius Items Pack
description: An Evil Genius is only as good as the equipment they surround themselves with! It’s time to boost your Lair’s capabilities with this Item Pack

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Rise of the Valkyrie Pack
description: It’s time to unleash the Valkyrie’s voice! When the Evil Genius decimates the plans of a rising star in the Opera world, you better believe she’s going to seek sonic vengeance!

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Team Fortress 2: Pyro Pack
description: The Pyro is a dangerous, uncontrollable force of destruction who acts without regard for the lives of those around them. Considered maniacal by some, the Pyro is a law unto themselves.

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Abomination Pack
description: Your Scientists have been working hard to overcome a stubborn threat to the Lair’s defences: during combat minions will give up and lie down, refusing to absorb any more punches or bullets, let alone fight back. Unacceptable, frankly.

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Cabal Pack
description: A cabal of Crime Lords are forming their own alliance, under the leadership of someone known only as ‘Espectro!’ Can the Evil Genius confront this wannabe Super Agent in time and bring them to their side, or is their destruction assured?!

name: Inside My Mind 2
description: A psychedelic platformer, each level of which is a step into the depths of the subconscious. Avoid the traps of the mind, find answers to questions and go through the path of personality transformation.

name: Island of AIto: Life After Death
description: Life after death is a small horror-themed story DLC for Island of Aito.

name: Jam Scrapz Collection
description: A collection of old Game Jam projects revamped, remastered, and rebooted for commercial and more playable value! More than two handfuls of games to play!

name: Jenni's Dong has got it Goin' On: The Jenni Trilogy
description: Jenni is an intersex bimbo bombshell who is always up for thrills and squeals. Famed artist, Doxy's most popular character comes to life in this interactive narrative!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams: Idyllic Pack
description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams: Radiant Pack
description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams: Tranquil Pack
description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Animals
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Cheregi
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Ukiyo-e 3
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Variety Pack 6XS
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Variety Pack 19
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Joe Danger 2: The Movie - Undead Movie Pack
description: Joe Danger, the world’s most determined stuntman, has started filming the scariest horror movie ever made! This eldritch add-on for Joe Danger 2: The Movie features:15 horrifying new levels!Six terrifying new characters!Three blood-curdling new environments!

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Early Cretaceous Pack
description: Breathe new life into your parks and discover a stunning array of Cretaceous animals with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Early Cretaceous Pack.

name: King's Blade
description: Take on the role of a warrior of an elite royal squad and defeat the bloodthirsty Barganian Empire in King's Blade - classic beat 'em up game set in a heroic fantasy setting.

name: KinnikuNeko: Super Muscle Cat
description: A cat with the body of a bodybuilder fights against aliens in this 2D platformer with anime aesthetics.

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris: Deus Ex Pack
description: The Deus Ex Pack features Adam Jensen themed skins, including Adam Jensen's signature combat rifle and the Deus Ex ring that allows your player to open treasure chests for 10% less gems.

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris: Icy Death Pack
description: Lara and her companions must overcome a new tomb filled with devious puzzles and hordes of deadly enemies. This pack also includes the Ice Climber skin, Icy Rifle, rings, and amulets to discover.

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris: Legend Pack
description: The Legend pack features Tomb Raider: Legend themed skins including a golden pistol and a ring that gives your player health regeneration powers.

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris: Twisted Gears Pack
description: The Twisted Gears pack adds a brand new tomb for Lara and her companions to explore and also includes the Original 1996 Lara Skin which will take fans on a nostalgic trip back to her first adventures as well as exclusive rings, amulets, and the Cluster Bomb Launcher.

name: Lone Knight
description: Lone Knight is a 2D Metroidvania, inspired by games like Super Metroid, Hollow Knight, Zelda: A link to the past and Haiku the robots. You'll explore a vast interconnected land, trying to survive looking for the source of a corrupted signal that holds the key of your future.

name: Loot List
description: Loot List is a thief simulator and action game about robbery. There's one difference though — here, every heist has to have a list.

name: Lumba: Hangover
description: Experience the thrilling aftermath of Lumba's destruction in LUMbA: HANGOVER! The substance has spread to four new victims, led once again by Pal. Together, they will engage in a doomed crusade across their world in this fast-paced, top-down shooter.

name: Luxo Buddies: Expansion Pack 1
description: One of the most Classic games which we all know and love! LUXO Buddies makes its return with an assortment of exciting new features. Match cards either by matching color or value and play action cards to change things up. Race against other players to empty your hand before everyone else.

name: Worlds of Magic: Sorcerer Lords Pack
description: Unveil five new Sorcerer Lords to fight as or against them!

name: Watch Dogs 2: Mega Pack
description:
You've got it, so flaunt it with this massive customization bundle. Contains custom clothing and skins for vehicles, weapons, and RC devices.
Includes the following packs:
- RETRO-MODERNIST
- GLOW_PRO
- RIDE BRITANNIA
- KICK IT
- VELVET COWBOY
- BAY AREA THRASH

name: Warriors Orochi 4: Scenario Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: We Are Football: National Teams
description: Become the football world champion: Make the dream of all football players and coaches come true with We Are Football. The National Teams DLC adds all international games to the main game.

name: Winter Resort Simulator Season 2: Content Pack
description: With the Season 2 - Content Pack of the Winter Resort Simulator, the winter wonderland is now even more extensive and offers more fun and variety with the many new vehicles and cable cars!

name: Winter Resort Simulator Season 2: TechnoAlpin - Snow Expert Pack
description: The Winter Resort Simulator - TechnoAlpin - Snow Expert Pack offers you a variety of new machines - all realistic replicas of the manufacturer’s machines and equipped with the original licence.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Nation Pack: Israel
description: As voted for by the community, the versatile Israeli army and its extensive use of modified foreign equipment joins the fray with 96 new units to add further depth to Eugen Systems' spectacular RTS.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Double Nation Pack Reds
description: Yugoslavia & Finland come to reinforce the pact side of Wargame: Red Dragon, bringing up to 186 new gorgeous units to add further strategic depth to Eugen Systems' spectacular RTS.

name: Warface: Sniper Tournament Pack
description: This DLC contains the full, permanent sniper gear and the B-5000 Sniper rifle. All of the gear included in this DLC has been designed to deliver the best performance thinkable, delivered in-game with class-specific buffs and perks. Put it on and let nothing get in your way!

name: Warface: Rifleman Tournament Pack
description: Contains the full Champion’s rifleman gear and the assault rifle MS Radek, both are permanent. This gear set is designed to deliver the best performance possible, possesses unique class-specific buffs. Put it on and don’t let anything hold you back from diving into the heat of battle!

name: Warface: Medic Tournament Pack
description: This set consists of full and permanent medic tournament gear, as well as the class-specific primary, the SX-41 shotgun. This gear is the perfect choice for PvP missions and contracts. Find only the most useful class-specific stats for PvP combat. Gear up, do a brass check and let nothing stay in your way – no one sensible will!

name: Warface: Engineer Tournament Pack
description: Contains the full Champion Engineer set as well as the class-specific primary weapon – the AP-84 Custom. This gear is permanent and is a perfect adaptation for any tactical PvP encounter you might end up in. The set also comes with class-specific perks that will make sure you’ll be the one standing victorious after the fight!

name: Warface: Complete Tournament Pack
description: This DLC contains permanent armor and weapons for all classes. All of the gear included in the DLC has been designed to deliver complete Warface experience and each item hand-picked to highlight class-specific perks and playstyles. Give it a shot!

name: V Rising: Dracula's Relics Pack
description:
Embrace your dark legacy and project your intentions of supremacy with the Dracula’s Relics pack.

Strikeout into Vardoran in iconic black, red, and gold. Don the Immortal King’s Mantle and mark yourself a commander of death with the Immortal King’s Greathelm as your battle crown. Whether on the battlefield or resting atop your extravagant throne, these colors represent a vampire with an ambition worthy of the next Dracula.

Return home to a castle worthy of the scourge of Vardoran. From throne to coffin, walls to floors, carpet runs to brilliant braziers, your castle will project regality. The royal decor will project an unmistakable air of dominance, elegance, and taste.

name: Valkyrie Drive: Bhikkhuni - Complete DLC Pack
description: VALKYRIE DRIVE Complete DLC Pack adds Mirei Shikishima and Mamori Tokonome from the anime VALKYRIE DRIVE -MERMAID- as playable characters, and 150+ new items for the Dressing Room.

name: Victoria II: Interwar Cavalry Unit Pack
description: The Interwar Cavalry unit pack adds unique models for armies using cavalry units in the interwar period between WWI and WWII. From 1919 and forward, twelve nations will receive new, unique and historically accurate uniforms.

name: Transcendence
description: This is a story about a small robot. As the first generation of commercial intelligent robot, it once served a brain neuroscientist. The machine was abandoned and cleared. Many years later, the robot in the garbage was awakened by unknown signals. It embarked on the road of finding who he is.

name: Transport INC: Map Pack
description: Conquer 20+ new maps for the free play mode. Transport across Canada, Japan, South Korea, Africa, South America and more!

name: Touch the Balls VR
description: Touching balls has never been easier! This casual VR world will hurl as many balls at you (and your friend) as you can handle, so be prepared!

name: To the Earth
description: Driving car in the space game. go to from mars to earth. drive safe!

name: The Sims 4: Holiday Celebration Pack
description: Celebrate the holidays and add festive content to your Sims’ homes!

name: Time Leap Paradise Super Live: Encore Pack
description: This DLC adds extra characters, songs, and outfits to Time Leap Paradise SUPER LIVE!

name: The Rumble Fish 2: Additional Character - Hazama
description: A new president of the PROBE-NEXUS, ostensibly to support the new chairman, Beatrice. But behind the scenes, he is working in the dark to extend his own power.

name: The Rumble Fish 2: Additional Character - Greed
description: A survivor of the illegal fighting organization "Valor". He joined the tournament "F.F.S." again in order to fight against a yet-to-be-seen strong fighter.

name: The Knight of the Crimson Tower: The Hunter's Moon
description: Where did the hunter go? A short story that puts the missing pieces back into the big picture. And also makes some promises.

name: The Ascent: Cyber Warrior Pack
description: Cyberpunk meets Samurai with the Cyber Warrior Pack! Stand out in Veles like the Cyber Warrior you deserve to be, with this Samurai inspired look, including 2 new weapons, 1 new tactical, 7 pieces of armor and 3 new weapon skins.

name: The Book of Bondmaids: Tales
description: Five tales of the Bondmaids from Trude Perkins that we learn during the visits of the Sorceress to Misallyna. For those, who have wish to read exotic tales.

name: Super Robot Wars 30: Bonus Mission Pack
description: This pack unlocks 15 Side Missions separate from the main storyline. Clearing them rewards extremely valuable Power Parts.

name: Street Legal Racing: Redline - High Quality Cars Pack
description: This DLC adds high-quality versions of Baiern CoupeSport/DevilSport (including CoupeSport DTM), Emer Nonus (including Nonus DTM), Einvagen 100 series (including 140DTM), MCA MC GT, PFAA Prime DLH, Hauler's SuperDuty, Ishima Enula, Shimutshibu Focer и Duhen SunStrip to your Street Legal Racing: Redline.

name: Strain
description: STRAIN is a story driven survival game taking place in a neon apocalypse. Stuck within the city walls, you must scavenge for resources, craft, cook, fight off raiders and join a faction to work your way to a position of power. The fate of the city rests in your hands.

name: Spire
description: A boy lost in a forgotten world whose only chance home is by trusting in a spirit guide. Explore this vast new universe while vanquishing foes using your guide as your weapon, healer and compass. Will you be able to get back home?

name: SpeedRunners: Youtuber Pack 1
description: Play as Markiplier, JesseCox, UberHaxorNova, or PeanutButterGamer in this Youtuber DLC pack for SpeedRunners!

name: SpeedRunners: Civil Dispute! Character Pack
description: Play as Showtime, Cannon Fyodor, Diamond Diva or Dashwell with this new character pack for SpeedRunners! Each character comes in four colours and with unique animations. These are purely cosmetic additions and do not affect gameplay.

name: Speedpunk: Garage Pack
description: Unlock 9 new cars with Garage pack.

name: Soviet Jump Game: Kaiju Chaos Bundle
description: Includes: - Exclusive playable character Labor Ranger with 5 outfits - Exclusive playable character Green Bean with 5 outfits

name: Soviet Jump Game: Founder's Pack
description: Get access to Laika + Tony Eagle (exclusive playable characters with 5 outfits each) and 5 Capitalist Corner Vouchers!

name: Snooker 19: Challenge Pack
description: Put your skills to the test and become a better player by taking on this all-new game mode for Snooker 19.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Landing Force Mission and Weapon Pack
description: Deploy to the South of France where enemy forces have commandeered an island off the coast of Marseille to house a gargantuan gun battery. The vast island is a hive of Nazi activity and features docks, lighthouse and a ruined keep as well as the huge gun emplacement which must be destroyed in order to help the Allied Landing Force liberate Southern France.

name: Snake Escape
description: Snake Escape is based on the classic Snake from 1997, but graphically and gameplay technically completely renewed.

name: Slayaway Camp: Supernatural Forces Killer Pack
description: Slayaway Camp's first official Premium Killer pack, each with their own special effects, kill animation, and psychotic tendencies.

name: Singularity
description: An accident on the road, you find yourself on an isolated island, fighting with all kinds of horrible creatures, building, exploring, seeking answers.

name: Senran Kagura: Peach Beach Splash - Sunshine Swimsuit Pack
description: Sunshine Swimsuit Pack DLC for the game Senran Kagura: Peach Beach Splash.

name: Senran Kagura: Peach Beach Splash - Mega Weapon Pack
description: Mega Weapon Pack for Senran Kagura: Peach Beach Splash.

name: Senran Kagura: Peach Beach Splash - Mega Accessory Pack
description: Mega Accessory Pack for Senran Kagura: Peach Beach Splash.

name: Senran Kagura: Estival Versus - Surprise Pack
description: The high-flying, high-bouncing ninja girls of Senran Kagura return, this time with more moves, more playable characters, more story and attitude, and more destruction online with matches that can support up to 10 players.

name: Senran Kagura: Estival Versus - Shinobi Pack
description: The high-flying, high-bouncing ninja girls of Senran Kagura return, this time with more moves, more playable characters, more story and attitude, and more destruction online with matches that can support up to 10 players.

name: Senran Kagura: Estival Versus - Mission Pack
description: The high-flying, high-bouncing ninja girls of Senran Kagura return, this time with more moves, more playable characters, more story and attitude, and more destruction online with matches that can support up to 10 players.

name: Senalux: Level Pack 2
description: The 2nd Senalux Level Pack adds another 6 Stages with a total of 72 levels and introduces 5 new optical components and a new mechanic.

name: Scum: Danny Trejo Character Pack
description: This is a character DLC pack for the SCUM game.

name: Runner2: Good Friends Character Pack
description: In most instances, “DLC” stands for “downloadable content.” With the Good Friends Character Pack, however, it stands for “Downright Lovable Characters.” Featuring the likes of Josef (Machinarium), Spelunky Guy (Spelunky), Raz (Psychonauts), Dr. Fetus (Super Meat Boy), Quote (Cave Story), Atlas (Portal 2), and Invisible CommanderVideo (duh), it’s a virtual tour de force of indelible indie awesomeness. It’ll run you (pun intended) about as much as a cup of coffee, and is scientifically proven to give you an energy boost equivalent to about eight pounds of espresso beans. Your heart might start beating dangerously fast, but your eyes and ears (and maybe even your nose - why not?) will most definitely thank you.

name: Royal Romances: Battle of the Woods
description: Explore additional locations and find all the hidden items! Make your own choices and see where they lead!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Joyous Japan
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Feudal Japan themed tables with controllable bumpers!

name: Rocksmith: Rush 5-Song Pack
description: Play "Tom Sawyer", "Limelight", “YYZ”, “Red Barchetta” and "Subdivisions" by Rush on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone accessible in AMP mode.

name: Rocksmith: Queen 5-Song Pack
description: Play "Bohemian Rhapsody", "Stone Cold Crazy", “Keep Yourself Alive”, “Fat Bottomed Girls” and "Killer Queen" by Queen on any electric guitar. Each song includes a new authentic tone accessible in AMP mode.

name: Rocksmith: Foo Fighters - Song Pack
description: Play "Best of You", "My Hero", “Walk”, “Times Like These” and "Wheels" by Foo Fighters on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone accessible in AMP mode.
